summary.Title: Demolition Worker for tasks in Copenhagen
summary.JobHeadline: Demolition Worker for tasks in Copenhagen
summary.Presentation:
Job nr. 171433
Do you want to use your good physique for active tasks within demolition? Then we have the job for you.
About the job

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Demolition Worker for tasks in Copenhagen
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Job nr. 171433

Do you want to use your good physique for active tasks within demolition? Then we have the job for you.

About the job

As a Demolition Worker for our customer, you will work for a family-owned company that has specialized in demolition for over 70 years. They are currently very busy, and we are therefore looking for fresh and energetic demolition workers for several exciting tasks in Greater Copenhagen. You will primarily work with:

  • Demolition of buildings inside and outside

  • Cleaning and sorting of waste

  • Paving of large concrete floors with electric hammer

  • Scaffolding work.

In addition, you will also have to take care of cleaning and sorting tasks during the working day.

Your profile

The working days are busy and therefore it is important that you can work efficiently and thoroughly without compromising on quality. You have previous experience from a similar from construction sites, demolition or alike. As the work is of a physical nature, we want you to thrive on active work tasks.

Working hours & practical info:

Monday to Friday 07.00-15.00.

Salary: 133,65 kr. pr. hour.

Are you interested?

If you’re interested in the position, we recommend that you send your application immediately. We hire on an ongoing basis.

If you have any questions regarding the position, do not hesitate contacting Moment.

We’re looking forward to hearing from you!
